00014 #ifndef DUMMYDRIVER_H_
00015 #define DUMMYDRIVER_H_
00016 
00017 #include "driver.h"
00018 #include "interface.h"
00019 
00020 class XDummyInterface : public XInterface
00021 {
00022     XNODE_OBJECT
00023     XDummyInterface(const char *name, bool runtime, const shared_ptr<XDriver> &driver)
00024         : XInterface(name, runtime, driver), m_bOpened(false)
00025     {}
00026 public:
00027     virtual ~XDummyInterface() {}
00028 
00029     virtual void open() throw (XInterfaceError &) {
00030         m_bOpened = true;
00031     }
00032     //! This can be called even if has already closed.
00033     virtual void close() throw (XInterfaceError &) {
00034         m_bOpened = false;
00035     }
00036 
00037     virtual bool isOpened() const {return m_bOpened;}
00038 private:
00039     bool m_bOpened;
00040 };
00041 template<class tDriver>
00042 class XDummyDriver : public tDriver
00043 {
00044     XNODE_OBJECT
00045 protected:
00046     XDummyDriver(const char *name, bool runtime, 
00047                  const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00048                  const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00049                  const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00050                  const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers);
00051 public:
00052     virtual ~XDummyDriver() {}
00053 protected:
00054     virtual void afterStop() {interface()->stop();}
00055     const shared_ptr<XDummyInterface> &interface() const {return m_interface;}
00056 private:
00057     shared_ptr<XListener> m_lsnOnOpen, m_lsnOnClose;
00058     void onOpen(const shared_ptr<XInterface> &);
00059     void onClose(const shared_ptr<XInterface> &);
00060     const shared_ptr<XDummyInterface> m_interface;
00061 };
00062 
00063 template<class tDriver>
00064 XDummyDriver<tDriver>::XDummyDriver(const char *name, bool runtime, 
00065                                     const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00066                                     const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00067                                     const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00068                                     const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers) :
00069     tDriver(name, runtime, scalarentries, interfaces, thermometers, drivers),
00070     m_interface(XNode::create<XDummyInterface>("Interface", false,
00071                                                dynamic_pointer_cast<XDriver>(this->shared_from_this())))
00072 {
00073     interfaces->insert(m_interface);
00074     m_lsnOnOpen = interface()->onOpen().connectWeak(
00075         this->shared_from_this(), &XDummyDriver<tDriver>::onOpen);
00076     m_lsnOnClose = interface()->onClose().connectWeak(
00077         this->shared_from_this(), &XDummyDriver<tDriver>::onClose);
00078 }
00079 template<class tDriver>
00080 void
00081 XDummyDriver<tDriver>::onOpen(const shared_ptr<XInterface> &)
00082 {
00083     try {
00084         this->start();
00085     }
00086     catch (XInterface::XInterfaceError& e) {
00087         e.print(this->getLabel() + i18n(": Starting driver failed, because "));
00088         interface()->stop();
00089     }
00090 }
00091 template<class tDriver>
00092 void
00093 XDummyDriver<tDriver>::onClose(const shared_ptr<XInterface> &)
00094 {
00095     try {
00096         this->stop();
00097     }
00098     catch (XInterface::XInterfaceError& e) {
00099         e.print(this->getLabel() + i18n(": Stopping driver failed, because "));
00100     }
00101 }
00102 
00103 #endif /*DUMMYDRIVER_H_*/
